00011 // stratified.cpp*
00012 #include "sampling.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 #include "film.h"
00015 // StratifiedSampler Declarations
00016 class StratifiedSampler : public Sampler {
00017 public:
00018         // StratifiedSampler Public Methods
00019         StratifiedSampler(int xstart, int xend,
00020                           int ystart, int yend,
00021                                           int xs, int ys, bool jitter);
00022         int RoundSize(int size) const {
00023                 return size;
00024         }
00025         ~StratifiedSampler() {
00026                 FreeAligned(imageSamples);
00027         }
00028         bool GetNextSample(Sample *sample);
00029 private:
00030         // StratifiedSampler Private Data
00031         int xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples;
00032         bool jitterSamples;
00033         int xPos, yPos;
00034         float *imageSamples, *lensSamples, *timeSamples;
00035         int samplePos;
00036 };
00037 // StratifiedSampler Method Definitions
00038 StratifiedSampler::StratifiedSampler(int xstart, int xend,
00039                 int ystart, int yend, int xs, int ys, bool jitter)
00040         : Sampler(xstart, xend, ystart, yend, xs * ys) {
00041         jitterSamples = jitter;
00042         xPos = xPixelStart;
00043         yPos = yPixelStart;
00044         xPixelSamples = xs;
00045         yPixelSamples = ys;
00046         // Allocate storage for a pixel's worth of stratified samples
00047         imageSamples = (float *)AllocAligned(5 * xPixelSamples *
00048                 yPixelSamples * sizeof(float));
00049         lensSamples =
00050                 imageSamples + 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00051         timeSamples =
00052                 lensSamples + 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00053         // Generate stratified camera samples for (_xPos_,_yPos_)
00054         StratifiedSample2D(imageSamples,
00055                 xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples,
00056                 jitterSamples);
00057         StratifiedSample2D(lensSamples,
00058                 xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples,
00059                 jitterSamples);
00060         StratifiedSample1D(timeSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples,
00061                 jitterSamples);
00062         // Shift stratified image samples to pixel coordinates
00063         for (int o = 0;
00064              o < 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00065                  o += 2) {
00066                 imageSamples[o]   += xPos;
00067                 imageSamples[o+1] += yPos;
00068         }
00069         // Decorrelate sample dimensions
00070         Shuffle(lensSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples, 2);
00071         Shuffle(timeSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples, 1);
00072         samplePos = 0;
00073 }
00074 bool StratifiedSampler::GetNextSample(Sample *sample) {
00075         // Compute new set of samples if needed for next pixel
00076         if (samplePos == xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples) {
00077                 // Advance to next pixel for stratified sampling
00078                 if (++xPos == xPixelEnd) {
00079                         xPos = xPixelStart;
00080                         ++yPos;
00081                 }
00082                 if (yPos == yPixelEnd)
00083                         return false;
00084                 // Generate stratified camera samples for (_xPos_,_yPos_)
00085                 StratifiedSample2D(imageSamples,
00086                         xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples,
00087                         jitterSamples);
00088                 StratifiedSample2D(lensSamples,
00089                         xPixelSamples, yPixelSamples,
00090                         jitterSamples);
00091                 StratifiedSample1D(timeSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples,
00092                         jitterSamples);
00093                 // Shift stratified image samples to pixel coordinates
00094                 for (int o = 0;
00095                      o < 2 * xPixelSamples * yPixelSamples;
00096                          o += 2) {
00097                         imageSamples[o]   += xPos;
00098                         imageSamples[o+1] += yPos;
00099                 }
00100                 // Decorrelate sample dimensions
00101                 Shuffle(lensSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples, 2);
00102                 Shuffle(timeSamples, xPixelSamples*yPixelSamples, 1);
00103                 samplePos = 0;
00104         }
00105         // Return next _StratifiedSampler_ sample point
00106         sample->imageX = imageSamples[2*samplePos];
00107         sample->imageY = imageSamples[2*samplePos+1];
00108         sample->lensU = lensSamples[2*samplePos];
00109         sample->lensV = lensSamples[2*samplePos+1];
00110         sample->time = timeSamples[samplePos];
00111         // Generate stratified samples for integrators
00112         for (u_int i = 0; i < sample->n1D.size(); ++i)
00113                 LatinHypercube(sample->oneD[i], sample->n1D[i], 1);
00114         for (u_int i = 0; i < sample->n2D.size(); ++i)
00115                 LatinHypercube(sample->twoD[i], sample->n2D[i], 2);
00116         ++samplePos;
00117         return true;
00118 }
00119 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Sampler *CreateSampler(const ParamSet &params, const Film *film) {
00120         bool jitter = params.FindOneBool("jitter", true);
00121         // Initialize common sampler parameters
00122         int xstart, xend, ystart, yend;
00123         film->GetSampleExtent(&xstart, &xend, &ystart, &yend);
00124         int xsamp = params.FindOneInt("xsamples", 2);
00125         int ysamp = params.FindOneInt("ysamples", 2);
00126         return new StratifiedSampler(xstart, xend, ystart, yend, xsamp, ysamp,
00127                 jitter);
00128 }
